item.title: U.S. sends aircraft carrier to South America in major escalation of military firepower
item.description: The deployment and the quickening pace of U.S. strikes, including one Friday, raised new speculation about how far the Trump administration may go in ...

item.title: DOJ hires immigration judges after months of layoffs
item.description: Judges will soon take the bench across 16 states, the Justice Department said. These include courts that saw the biggest losses of judges this year.

item.title: Pakistan bans hard-line Islamist party known for its fierce anti-blasphemy stance
item.description: Pakistan banned a hard-line Islamist party on Thursday, more than a week after heated clashes with police that left at least five people dead.

item.title: U.S. imposes sanctions on Colombia's president and family over drug trade allegations
item.description: The sanctions sharply escalate tensions with the leftist leader of a country that has traditionally been one of the closest U.S. allies in South Ameri...

item.title: Coffee-driven deforestation is making it harder to grow coffee, watchdog group says
item.description: In Brazil's coffee-producing areas, more than 42,000 square miles of forest have disappeared over about two decades, says Coffee Watch. Deforestation ...
